price: Mu by’ukuri (iyi Qur’an) ni urwibutso kuri wowe no ku bantu bawe kandi muzayibazwa.
arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَذِكۡرٞ لَّكَ وَلِقَوۡمِكَۖ وَسَوۡفَ تُسۡـَٔلُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-innahu ladhik'run laka waliqawmika wasawfa tus'alūna
